mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.contract_number AS "contractNumber", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.address AS "address", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.total_fee AS "totalFee", a.pay_fee AS "payFee", a.pay_date AS "payDate", a.contract_status AS "contractStatus", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.install_status AS "installStatus", a.install_by AS "dkInstallPerson.id", a.sale_by AS "tuser.id", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", dkInstallPerson.name AS "dkInstallPerson.name", tuser.name AS "tuser.name"
LEFT JOIN dk_install_person dkInstallPerson ON dkInstallPerson.id = a.install_by LEFT JOIN sys_user tuser ON tuser.id = a.sale_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dk_contract a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.contract_number LIKE '%'||#{contractNumber}||'%' '%'+#{contractNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{contractNumber},'%')
AND a.mobile LIKE '%'||#{mobile}||'%' '%'+#{mobile}+'%' concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_contract( id, name, contract_number, mobile, telephone, address, order_date, member_id, total_fee, pay_fee, pay_date, contract_status, pay_status, install_status, install_by, sale_by, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{contractNumber}, #{mobile}, #{telephone}, #{address}, #{orderDate}, #{memberId}, #{totalFee}, #{payFee}, #{payDate}, #{contractStatus}, #{payStatus}, #{installStatus}, #{dkInstallPerson.id}, #{tuser.id}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dk_contract SET name = #{name}, contract_number = #{contractNumber}, mobile = #{mobile}, telephone = #{telephone}, address = #{address}, order_date = #{orderDate}, member_id = #{memberId}, total_fee = #{totalFee}, pay_fee = #{payFee}, pay_date = #{payDate}, contract_status = #{contractStatus}, pay_status = #{payStatus}, install_status = #{installStatus}, install_by = #{dkInstallPerson.id}, sale_by = #{tuser.id}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
